channel.title: Efak
channel.description: why did efak close down thats just stuped im pretty shure abunch of people donated cash? will they get it back or its jus one big scam... i think this is complete bullshit and people were scammed for there money and time

item.title: Efak
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:31187”]Since when was a DONATION a guarantee of anything?
People donate out of goodwill, the don’t donate for anything in return.
There was no scam.[/quote]

But, if your told that it is going to a certain cause, then it HAS to go to that cause. Otherwise it is FRAUD.

Take me for example, I feel like a scammer right now. Why? Because we got over 500 dollars in donations for Afelhem, and we had to shut down the game. I feel horrible for all those who donated, so I am trying to pay them back slowly.

Read full topic
